General.Name: Aesler Grup Internasional Tbk Pt
General.Description: PT Aesler Grup Internasional Tbk provides architectural and construction management services in Indonesia. It offers urban, city, town planning, architecture design, construction management, and other correlated services. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.
General.Address: Noble House Building, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12950
